snippet.title: LeifsAdventure - Intro Song - Story Trailer
snippet.description:
I am very happy to share this epic new story trailer to highlight the background story of Leif's Adventure.

In the very early part of Leif’s Adventure: Netherworld Hero the townsmen of Hammerfall will gather and listen to the famous bard performing the song of the ancient hero that has defeated the evil forces hundreds of years ago.

But this story is history and a new evil is lurking on the horizon - so join us and listen to this call for a new hero and take in this artistically appealing intro trailer for Leif’s Adventure: Netherworld Hero.

Play the Demo on Steam today: 
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1392980/Leifs_Adventure_Netherworld_Hero/
